tasks.task: Transitioning to conservation agriculture and regenerative farming practices
subtasks: Evaluate the impact on chemical inputs (herbicides, fungicides, fertilizers)
Plan for reducing dependence on artificial nitrogen through soil health improvements
Transition to nature-based products as fossil fuel resources diminish
Design a farming system that balances food production with environmental sustainability

tasks.task: Adapting farming machinery for reduced input and weather resilience
subtasks: Shift from traditional tillage to conservation agriculture methods (direct drilling)
Reduce machinery and workforce requirements for time efficiency
Minimize fossil fuel consumption by decreasing annual tractor hours and fuel use per hectare
Explore multi-farm or contracting work opportunities to utilize tractor downtime
